exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight exercise that strengthens the upper body.
steps: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to the starting position

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A fundamental lower body exercise that targets multiple muscle groups.
steps: Lower your body as if sitting back into a chair
Keep your chest up and weight in your heels
Push back up to the starting position
